entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:55 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:55 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 8:55 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
